Nov. 22, 1913 D Llanelly Contest (Class B)
Llanelly Contest (Class B) 20 Test Piece Contest Llanelly Contest llanelly-contest-class-b

The Martyrs
St. Peter's Hall, Llanelly Prizes - 1st £8 and cup, 2nd £4, 3rd £2. Organised by West Wales Brass Band Association. 6 bands competed.
Aug. 12, 2013, 7:40 a.m. Oct. 1, 2018, 3:13 p.m.
1 4th V.B. Welsh Regiment (Llanelly) W. H. Williams
2 Calfaria Clydach T. J. Jones
3 Burry Port Town David John
